@graph.description:
Reference-based RNA-Seq data analysis

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Reference-based RNA-Seq data analysis](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/transcriptomics/tutorials/ref-based/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
